ygData.subject: Re: Eye of confusion
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, basically it blinds the target. this is deadly in Pvp.  try it on yourself and see. Against a mob, its worthless if your in melee with it.  However, what
ygData.messageBody:
Okay, basically it blinds the target.

this is deadly in Pvp. try it on yourself and see.

Against a mob, its worthless if your in melee with it. However, what
you can do is with your pet, cast this while in melee, and follow it
with some mega taunt spell. When the target comes after you, it will be
confused, and unable to find you. If you dont cast a taunt spell, it
will happily bash on your pet.


-----Original Message-----
From: WeinisFROG@... [mailto:WeinisFROG@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 3:05 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Eye of confusion


From: WeinisFROG@...

it is like fear only they run in all directions and for alonger period
of time
